wp:term.wp:term_description: On Lake Michigan in Illinois, is among the largest cities in the U.S. Famed for its bold architecture, it has a skyline punctuated by skyscrapers such as the iconic John Hancock Center. Willis Tower (formerly the Sears Tower) and the neo-Gothic Tribune Tower. The city is also renowned for its museums, including the Art Institute of Chicago with its noted Impressionist and Post-Impressionist works.

Los Angeles is a sprawling Southern California city and the center of the nationâ€™s film and television industry. Near its iconic Hollywood sign, studios such as Paramount Pictures, Universal and Warner Brothers offer behind-the-scenes tours.

Miami is the cultural, economic and financial center of South Florida in the United States. The city covers an area of about 56 square miles between the Everglades to the west and Biscayne Bay to the east.

New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean. At its core is Manhattan, a densely populated borough thatâ€™s among the worldâ€™s major commercial, financial and cultural centers. Its iconic sites include skyscrapers such as the Empire State Building and sprawling Central Park.

Orlando, a city in central Florida, is home to more than a dozen theme parks. Chief among its claims to fame is Walt Disney World, comprised of parks like the Magic Kingdom and Epcot, as well as water parks.

San Francisco, is the cultural, commercial, and financial center of Northern California. San Francisco is known for its cool summers, fog, steep rolling hills, eclectic mix of architecture, and landmarks, including the Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, the former Alcatraz Federal Penitentiary, Fisherman's Wharf, and its Chinatown district.

item.title: What if I accidentally cause damage to the property?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
Donâ€™t worry â€“ accidents happen. Tell whoever is responsible for the property maintenance as soon as possible. You will be expected to cover the cost of putting it right.

Donâ€™t try to ignore or hide damage because it could get worse, and it will only come out of your deposit at the end of the tenancy.

item.title: Whatâ€™s the pet policy?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
The pet policy depends on the terms in each specific lease agreement. You must notify our team of any pets before move-in.

When you already have a pet and you want to add an extra one, please call our office first. We will process every request separately depending on the lease terms.

item.title: Can I decorate or make changes to the property?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded: In most cases, a tenant can only decorate or make changes to the property with the express permission of the landlord. We recommend receiving this permission in writing.

item.title: Can I change the locks?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded: No, installing new locks on your own would violate the lease agreement terms. It's possible to install a new lock upon request and approval; this may be a tenant charge depending on the situation.

item.title: What happens if I canâ€™t pay the rent on time?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded: Any problems that may affect the potential payment of rent should be notified to the relevant office straight away. You may be charged a fee for late payment of rent.

item.title: When do you increase the rent?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
Rent increases usually happen after the lease term expiration.

Of course, it isn't always increased. Our analysis accounts for the property owner's requests and relevant market conditions.

item.title: Do I need renters insurance?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
Yes, all the tenants need to have renters insurance before moving in.

You have to show a rentersâ€™ insurance confirmation before getting the keys.

item.title: What is your security deposit policy?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded: Security deposit equals to one month rent and may vary based on credit. You need to pay the full amount before moving in.

item.title: How can I visit a property?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
Call the number on the listing directly or request the booking through view booking form.

After receiving a request, we'll quickly organize a property viewing. Our goal is to make sure you'll find your dream home.

Please note that we are required to provide current tenants at occupied properties at least 24 hoursâ€™ notice prior to scheduled showings.

item.title: Is it possible to apply for a property that I havenâ€™t viewed?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
We prefer for all applicants to either see the property in person or send a trusted 3rd party to view on their behalf.

We understand that you may not have time to view the property. In this case, you could arrange for a friend or family member to view the property on your behalf.

It's important to see the property instead of only looking at the photos. The photos serve as an approximate representation. Applicants should check whether the property matches their expectations and needs.

item.title: What is a vacation rental?
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
Vacation rentals are freestanding, attached or guest houses, villas, cottages, apartments, condos, and timeshares offered for short term occupancy.

They are largely unregulated. Some rental properties are just one in a large portfolio handled and managed by a leasing company. Other vacation rentals are cared for and rented out by, the owner.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: mrsaqibsarwar
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Spacious One Bed Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Appointed with all of the amenities required for a relaxing stay, this suite is the ideal home away from home for your Orlando experience. Enjoy the convenience of all nearby theme parks and attractions, featuring resort amenities and stylish comfort perfect for small families, business travelers or couples. Guests will love our flat-screen television and Free Wi-Fi connectivity.

Truly a home away from home, unwind in the contemporary elegance of a studio suite featuring resort amenities and stylish comfort perfect for families, business travelers or couples. Tech-savvy guests will love our flat-screen televisions and Free Wi-Fi connectivity, while those who seek out creature comforts will delight in touches like gel-infused Sealy bed and spacious bathroom.

item.title: Exotic House on Hilltop
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Bright & Spacious, Top Floor/Corner Suite next to Sooke is sure to please. VILLAGE SPLENDOUR â€“ this suite is in a concrete and steel, pet friendly, family building in a convenient downtown location. Immaculate south facing 3 superb bedroom, 3 bathroom corner suite in the community of central Quesnel. The final room on the main floor, facing the private west-facing garden, is the master bedroom. The home and gardens have been loving maintained by the current owner.

Don't miss this opportunity This home is only accepting cash and is a short sale with limited time! Buses, church, shopping, all amenities close by. Located in-town, adjacent to Point Grey, for an eco-friendly walk everywhere lifestyle. Situated on .31 acres and at the end of a very quiet cul-de-sac makes this an ideal location. As you walk into this 1962 home - you will see all the original character such as large commercial grade low E windows, Smart Wiring Options, brand new hardwood floors and carpet & exquisitely designed kitchen. This is a prestigious home. Note: large 6 ft basement for storage not included in measurements.

item.title: Spacious and Scenic Bungalow
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy the country living on this .53 acre mini estate and be only minutes from all amenities, ferries, the airport, and downtown Surrey. Bathed in sunlight from lots of windows, skylights & vaulted ceiling, this great NYC style Loft is sure to impress. South West corner, 3 bed, 3 bathroom with ocean, mountain and city views. Quality finishing, superior sound insulation & 2 spacious decks. Beautiful Gibraltar Model enhanced by 36'x 17' Screened Patio with beautiful travertine floor adding natural richness & a unique appearance to the patio.

Located in-town, adjacent to Gastown, for an eco-friendly walk everywhere lifestyle. Situated on 2 legal lots with a west facing rear yard backing onto a 3.7 acre natural park which offers panoramic views of the city and water plus amazing sunrises and sunsets. White Cabinetry/Granite counters, w/w carpet throughout the residence & Epoxy coated Concrete floors (Radiant in-floor heat) completes the picture. Great Investment !

item.title: Contemporary Villa
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Transformed through a tasteful and seem-less renovation, the floor plan has been beautifully adapted to modern life. Over 1,300 sq ft of living space which includes 3BRs and 3 baths. The wine cooler, sconzes, & TV's does not stay. The moment you enter the suite you will love the floor to ceiling windows that enhance the view. This beautiful homeâ€™s understated street presence is in perfect harmony with this tranquil neighbourhood.

The grounds, while compact, are designed to provide private garden areas, patio area, decks and off street parking. drive in garage with workshop area, en-suite bath and White Cabinetry/Granite counters round out this beautiful home. This is a large alternative for those who are tired of condo living and all the strata council rules and regulations and strata fees.

item.title: Stylish Studio Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: Whether you are a first time buyer, investor, or looking for a pied de terre have a look at this one! Substantially renovated with many large features, this custom home stands out as a unique and refreshing offering. This 1 bed suite offers outstanding views of the city, ocean and mountains. Walking/biking distance to downtown and shopping. Laminate Flooring is in ALL the Bedrooms - ABSOLUTELY the most beautiful FLOORS. Walking distance to everything. Just enough garden space so you can enjoy your own flower beds & veggies - and there's a covered patio for morning coffee. The downstairs has a great layout with Hand-chiseled Quartz Island, wood floors and commercial grade Wolf & Sub Zero appliances, plus even space left over for your piano! All Offers subject to Executors approval within reasonable business hours

item.title: Modern One Bed Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Appointed with all of the amenities required for a relaxing stay, this suite is the ideal home away from home for your Orlando experience. Enjoy the convenience of all nearby theme parks and attractions, featuring resort amenities and stylish comfort perfect for small families, business travelers or couples. Guests will love our flat-screen television and Free Wi-Fi connectivity.

Truly a home away from home, unwind in the contemporary elegance of a studio suite featuring resort amenities and stylish comfort perfect for families, business travelers or couples. Tech-savvy guests will love our flat-screen televisions and Free Wi-Fi connectivity, while those who seek out creature comforts will delight in touches like gel-infused Sealy bed and spacious bathroom.

item.title: Freshly Built Modern Villa
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded:
Transformed through a tasteful and seem-less renovation, the floor plan has been beautifully adapted to modern life. Over 1,300 sq ft of living space which includes 3BRs and 3 baths. The wine cooler, sconzes, & TV's does not stay. The moment you enter the suite you will love the floor to ceiling windows that enhance the view. This beautiful homeâ€™s understated street presence is in perfect harmony with this tranquil neighbourhood.

The grounds, while compact, are designed to provide private garden areas, patio area, decks and off street parking. drive in garage with workshop area, en-suite bath and White Cabinetry/Granite counters round out this beautiful home. This is a large alternative for those who are tired of condo living and all the strata council rules and regulations and strata fees.

item.title: Cosy, Contemporary House
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: Great Opportunity to get into the real estate market for less than the cost of Rent!! A traditional floorplan with 3 very affordable bedroom/3 bathroom and a spacious Rec Room w/wet bar above the garage. Bathed in sunlight from lots of windows, skylights & vaulted ceiling, this gorgeous suite is going to knock your socks off! Excellent location just a block from Happy Valley and minutes to Beacon Hill Park. It keeps comingâ€¦ gorgeous floor to ceilings windows to allow plenty of natural lighting, a fantastic sunroom perched on the front of the house, in-suite laundry, separate dining area & hard surface counter-tops. Two side x side parking stalls, low monthly strata fees & Zoned for Live/Work; this is Urban Living at it's finest!

item.title: Luxury & Spacious Villa
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: So well built and with so many select amenities, this home delivers the very best of warm,period charm & superior upgrading. With 5 bathrooms, 5 beds up and a stunning rec room plumbed for a wet bar down plus a large single car garage this home offers excellent value and utility while also offering a family oriented tight knit community to call home. A wonderful home/retreat for anyone who enjoys a special sense of style. Don't miss this opportunity This home is only accepting cash and is a short sale with limited time! Excellent location just a block from Sooke and minutes to central Kamloops. Private backyard backs onto a quiet green belt, desirable patio space with an outdoor fire pit await the summer nights. Wide hallways, a superb sunroom perched on the front of the house, full basement with drive in garage and granite island. Call now and select your colors!

item.title: Bright Artistic Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: Secure parking and additional storage in a downtown concrete building, this suite is in a concrete and steel, pet friendly, family building in a convenient downtown location. An ideal 1 bed, 1 bathroom home in a convenient village location. The kitchen, living and dining rooms open out to a level, private west facing 270sqft patio, great for entertaining. The strata is well run; the building was remediated in 1944 (new roof as well). Buses, church, shopping, all amenities close by. Just enough garden space so you can enjoy your own flower beds & veggies - and there's a covered patio for morning coffee. In great condition with many character features including private deck overlooking the back yard and park, Vinyl thermo windows and Epoxy coated Concrete floors (Radiant in-floor heat).

item.title: Comfortable Royal Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: A truly remarkable property nestled at the end of a cul-de-sac in Latoria Walk. Set on a private, southwest corner of a well managed complex in the heart of vibrant Point Grey, this gorgeous suite is going to knock your socks off! Modern open concept living w/2 unique bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (Master w/ensuite), Spacious Living Room, Dining room w/Bay window, & an Open Kitchen w/Stainless Steel appliances. Suite is plumbed and wired and ready to go. The roomy kitchen is a cook's delight & there's a separate dining room with extra tech nook - ideal computer/office space. It is ideally situated on a very private lot along a whisper quiet street. Easy care lot, extra parking pad, located on a major bus route and within walking distance to Fernwood. stainless appliances, 36" doorways, commercial grade Wolf & Sub Zero appliances, large commercial grade low E windows & wood floors completes the picture. BONUS: 2 years of parking included!

Beautifully suited to entertaining, the floor plan has been beautifully adapted to modern life. Immaculate south facing 2 bed, 2 bathroom corner suite in the community of Sooke. It keeps comingâ€¦ built-in bookcases, wood windows, in-suite laundry, inlayed oak and fir floors & crafting room.

item.title: Modern and Luxury Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: As soon as you walk into this Point Grey home you will be struck by the open space and clean lines - the perfect canvas on which to create your dream home. Situated across from unique Elk Lake, the floor plan has been beautifully adapted to modern life. Over 1,100 sq ft of living space which includes 2 beds and 2 bathrooms. Unique zoning for the building allows for legal short term rentals, pets allowed and a great onsite caretaker make this a worry free home. The extensive 2007 renovation has expanded floor space and functionality while respecting the integrity of the original design. It is ideally situated on a very private lot along a whisper quiet street. Beautiful log construction home on 1 acre. Smart Wiring Options, granite island, feature wall unit w/fireplace, field stone fireplace and drive in garage with workshop area lend a sophisticated feel to the home.

item.title: A Grand Modern Apartment
item.dc:creator: mrjohndoe
item.content:encoded: Here's an unbeatable opportunity to get into the market at a sparkling clean price. Set on a private, southwest corner of a well managed complex in the heart of vibrant central Kamloops, this home has been designed to take advantage of its beach frontage with decks running the entire length of the house and out over the boathouse. Immaculate south facing 2 great bedroom, 2 bathroom corner suite in the community of Dollarton Harbour. Beautiful Gibraltar Model enhanced by 36'x 17' Screened Patio with beautiful travertine floor adding natural richness & a unique appearance to the patio. Perfect for an investor (short term rental rates are close to $2,000 per month) or for a first time home buyer (furniture negotiable!). Located in-town, adjacent to Happy Valley, for an eco-friendly walk everywhere lifestyle. This easy care property features a west facing patio off the kitchen ideal for summer BBQs and entertaining.
